nodes.text: Burn salves were medicinal ointments for treating burns. They could be dispensed as an ocher gel that came in tubes. In 3 ABY, the stormtrooper Thara Nyende brought supplies for the some Sullustans at her uncle's cantina. The cantina owner called the diminutive Sullustan Myan over to hand him a tube of burn salve to aid some injured workers from dorm four.
Burn salve first appeared in the 2015 novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
